com.daw.pms.Service.NeteaseCloudMusic

Interface NCMSongService

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    NCMSongServiceImpl

    public interface NCMSongService
    Service for handle songs of netease cloud music.
    Since:
    7/21/23
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Daw Loph

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Result getDetailSong(String ids, String cookie)
      Get detail song with ids.
      NCMLyrics getLyrics(Long id, String cookie)
      Get the lyrics of the song with id.
      List<NCMSong> getSimilarSongs(Long id, String cookie)
      Get the similar songs of song id.

    • Method Detail

      • getDetailSong

        Result getDetailSong(String ids,
                     String cookie)
        Get detail song with ids.
        Parameters:
        ids - The id of song, multiple songs separated by comma.
        cookie - Your cookie for netease cloud music.
        Returns:
        Detail song with ids, wrapped with Result DTO, the data is NCMDetailSong.
        API Note:
        GET /song/detail?ids=ids

      • getSimilarSongs

        List<NCMSong> getSimilarSongs(Long id,
                              String cookie)
        Get the similar songs of song id.
        Parameters:
        id - The id of song.
        cookie - Your cookie for netease cloud music.
        Returns:
        A list of songs that is similar to song id.
        API Note:
        GET /simi/song?id=id

      • getLyrics

        NCMLyrics getLyrics(Long id,
                    String cookie)
        Get the lyrics of the song with id.
        Parameters:
        id - The id of song.
        cookie - Your cookie for netease cloud music.
        Returns:
        Lyrics of your song in netease cloud music.
        API Note:
        GET /lyric/new?id=id

      • getSongsLink

        Result getSongsLink(String ids,
                    String level,
                    String cookie)
        Get the url of songs with ids and quality level.
        Parameters:
        ids - The song's id, multiple songs separated by comma.
        level - Quality of song, include standard, higher, exhigh, lossless, hires, jyeffect, sky, jymaster.
        cookie - Your cookie for netease cloud music.
        Returns:
        A map which the key is the song's id and the value is the url of songs with ids and quality level, wrapped with Result DTO, the data is Map<String,String>.
        API Note:
        GET /song/url/v1?id=ids&level=level

      • searchResourcesByKeyword

        Result searchResourcesByKeyword(String keyword,
                                Integer pageNo,
                                Integer pageSize,
                                Integer type,
                                String cookie)
        Search and return paged songs/resources according to the given keyword name.
        Parameters:
        keyword - Your search keywords.
        pageNo - The page number.
        pageSize - The page size.
        type - Search type, 1 for song, 10 for album, 100 for singers, 1000 for playlists, 1002 for user, 1004 for MV, 1006 for lyrics, 1009 for podcasts, 1014 for videos, 1018 for misc, 2000 for voice.
        cookie - Your cookie for netease cloud music.
        Returns:
        Searched songs wrapped with Result DTO, the data is PagedDataDTO<NCMSong>.
        API Note:
        GET /cloudsearch?keywords=as long as you love me&offset=0&limit=30&type=1
